text: Location of Angola There are about 800 types of moths of Angola The moths (mostly nocturnal) and butterflies (mostly diurnal) together make up the taxonomic order Lepidoptera. This is a list of moth species which have been recorded in Angola. ==Anomoeotidae== *Anomoeotes infuscata Talbot, 1929 *Anomoeotes leucolena Holland, 1893 *Anomoeotes phaeomera Hampson, 1920
